articles.description: Spencer Rattler didn't create these unrealistic expectations, but he'll continue to be measured against them.
articles.content: Spencer Rattler was anointed the 2021 Heisman favorite before the 2020 season officially ended. He was tabbed as the No. 1 pick in the 2022 NFL Draft almost as soon as the 2021 edition wrapped. By Ju… [+858 chars]
